

# Invoice Validator


---

## Convert xsd to java pojo
xjc -d src/main/java/generated -p com.melasoft.xsdvalidater schema.xsd


## Request example
POST : http://localhost:8090/api/invoices
```shell

{
  "base64xml": ""
}

## Response example
{
    "message": "Invoice saved successfully"
}

With Curl:


curl --location 'http://localhost:8090/api/invoices' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
  "base64xml": ""
}'

```
---

## Swagger URL 
http://localhost:8090/docs
